mapper.select: select p.product_code, p.image_path, pr.product_name, pr.price from product pr , product_image p where pr.product_code IN (select product_code from wish where user_id = #{userId} ) and pr.product_code = p.product_code ;
mapper.insert: insert into wish ( user_id, product_code ) values (#{userId}, #{productCode})
mapper.delete: delete from wish where user_id = #{userId} AND product_code = #{productCode}
